articles.title: India, world’s largest sugar consumer, wants its people to eat more - Economic Times

articles.title: Hot or cold, weather alone has no significant effect on COVID-19 spread - EurekAlert
articles.description: Research led by The University of Texas at Austin is adding some clarity on weather's role in COVID-19 infection, with a new study finding that temperature and humidity do not play a significant role in coronavirus spread.
